text: I ordered Leeco 2 i payed 138€ wit delivery, and after one weak they send me an email sayig that the phone is not aviable in the gold color if i wanted a rose one , i replied yes and after 3 days they send me the same meesege if i wan the phone i replied the same anwser and now they are not ansewring for a hole weak alredy. And in my coolicool profile under orders there is no order like i didnt order nothing.. They are fuckingg scamers
